title: Bronze support looking for people
body: Bronze support sick of the up and down time im having with ADC's wouldn't mind a solid duo partner and or team for flex, Maining Leona, taric and Morgana with Lulu and Janna as back ups or ori and annie for fake out. Can voice chat and can play any situation. Hit me up in game

replies.body:
Hey! I'd like to play with you. I'm only low lvl so I cant play ranked but at least I'm not a braindead player. I've got pretty good game knowledge and yea my IGN is "Talón" i'll add you and hopefully we can play!
BTW I usually Mid/Top and it sounded like you wanted an ADC to play with but anyway I'd still like to play with you :D
